ul.li: Skill Proficiencies:Insight, and pick one: Athletics, Security

setters.set: Insight, and pick one: Athletics, Intimidation, Two of your choice, Uniform, 2-way radio kit, handcuffs, 10 cr

description.p: Your experience in enforcing the law, and dealing with lawbreakers, gives you a feel for local laws and criminals. You can easily find the local outpost of the watch or a similar organization, and just as easily pick out the dens of criminal activity in a community, although you're more likely to be welcome in the former locations rather than the latter.
